name: Please, Don't Yell at Me!
description:
Please Don't Yell At Me is a game for teams or group of 5 friends/coworkers to engage in a yelling match for delivering food and other things in time!

Right now it is in its prototype phase and the game might be missing a lot of things, so:

  • If you have any suggestions or if you find any issues, please let me know!
  • I am a solo developer so, I am currently implementing stuff and might take some time to finish the basic things about the game
  • The game only supports a few groups playing at any one time
